summary: Ida and Albin are a happy couple. They set off to a cabin in the vast Swedish woodlands to have a fun holiday with their friends. But under the floorboards waits an evil from Sweden's dark past.
cast: Patrik Berg-Almkvisth|Lisa Henni|Patrick Saxe|Johannes Brost|Amanda Renberg|Jessica Blomkvist|Max Wallmo|Anna Henriksson|Ingar Sigvardsdotter|Ralf Beck|Sanna Ekman|Julia Knutson|Jessica Darberg|Chaton Anderson|A.R. Hellquist
